name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in **Python**, **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, adept at developing advanced machine learning solutions. Proficient in utilizing cloud services such as **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform** to architect robust infrastructures, and leveraging SQL for efficient data management. Skilled in implementing ML techniques, including **NLP**, **GenAI**, and **LLM**, with a focus on real-time monitoring and observability. 

My career includes leading enterprise projects that integrate cutting-edge AI/ML capabilities for enhanced predictive analytics and intelligent automation. I excel in developing efficient MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My strong background in **microservices architecture**, CI/CD automation, and compliance with security standards ensures that the applications I build are both performant and secure, complying with regulations like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I bring a collaborative approach to team projects, working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

Utilized **SQL** and NoSQL databases for data management, facilitating efficient ingestion and retrieval of large datasets relevant to ML applications in the healthcare and financial sectors.

Established robust testing frameworks and security measures within CI/CD pipelines to ensure high standards of quality and security for all deployed ML solutions.
Delivered presentations and reports to stakeholders on project progress, demonstrating strong collaboration and effective communication throughout the software development lifecycle.
Achieved a deployment consistency of **95%** across cloud environments by optimizing deployment processes and reducing time-to-market for ML features.

Utilized **Python** to develop ML models for detecting fraud, employing **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, enhancing anomaly detection capabilities by **30%**.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement scalable AI solutions, leveraging NLP and Generative AI frameworks to enhance user experiences and business insights.
Crafted SQL queries to analyze model performance data, optimizing existing pipelines for improved predictive accuracy in financial forecasting and risk assessment.
